column2: Please answer the following questions
1. How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?
column4: Never|Monthly or less|two to four times a month|two to three times a week|four or more times a week

column2: 2. How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?
column4: 1 or 2|3 or 4|5 or 6|7 to 9|10 or more

column2: 3. How often do you have six or more drinks on one occasion?
column4: Never|less than monthly|monthly|weekly|daily or almost daily

column2: 4. How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?
column4: Never|less than monthly|monthly|weekly|daily or almost daily

column2: 5. How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected from you because of drinking?
column4: Never|less than monthly|monthly|weekly|daily or almost daily

column2: 6. How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?
column4: Never|less than monthly|monthly|weekly|daily or almost daily

column2: 7. How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?
column4: Never|less than monthly|monthly|weekly|daily or almost daily

column2: 8. How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because you had been drinking?
column4: Never|less than monthly|monthly|weekly|daily or almost daily

column2: 9. Have you or someone else been injured as a result of your drinking?
column4: No|Yes, but not in the last year|Yes, during the last year

column2: 10. Has a relative, or friend, or a doctor or other health worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?
column4: No|Yes, but not in the last year|Yes, during the last year
